query:
INSERT INTO Bans (
               player_id,
               player_ip,
               banned_by,
               reason,
               plugin_version_id,
               expires_at
             )
             VALUES (
               ?,
               COALESCE(?, (SELECT ip_address FROM Players WHERE id = ?)),
               ?,
               ?,
               (SELECT id FROM PluginVersions ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT 1),
               ?
             )
